SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY B.REC_CZSJ DESC) RNO, B.*, CZR.USERNAME ||' '|| CZR.REALNAME REC_CZR_NAME,TJ.USERNAME ||' '|| TJ.REALNAME GSSH_TJRIDNAME, WHR.REALNAME WHR_REALNAME,TO_char(B.GSSH_TJRQ,'yyyy-MM-dd') GSSH_TJRQS, WHDW.DPRTNAME WHDW_DRPTNAME, '任务单号:'||B.rwdh || ' ' || (CASE WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 0 THEN '创建' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 1 THEN '提交' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 2 THEN '已审核' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 3 THEN '已批准' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 4 THEN '中止（关闭）' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 5 THEN '审核驳回' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 6 THEN '批准驳回' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 8 THEN '作废' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 9 THEN '指定结束'
WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 10 THEN '完成' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 11 THEN '撤销' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 12 THEN '修改' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 13 THEN '改版' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 14 THEN '已生效' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 15 THEN '工单工时提交' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 16 THEN '借出确认' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 17 THEN '归还' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 18 THEN '导入' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 24 THEN '工单工时确认' END) REC_HD, ( CASE WHEN B.rwlx = 1 THEN '定检执行任务' WHEN B.rwlx = 2 THEN (CASE WHEN B.rwzlx = 1 THEN '非例行-时控件工单' WHEN B.rwzlx = 2 THEN '非例行-附加工单' WHEN B.rwzlx = 3 THEN '非例行-排故工单' END ) END ) RWLXS, (CASE WHEN B.REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} THEN 'CURRENT' ELSE 'LAST' END) DATA_VERSION
FROM B_S_009_REC B LEFT JOIN T_USER WHR ON WHR.ID = B.WHRID
LEFT JOIN T_USER CZR ON CZR.ID = B.REC_CZRID LEFT JOIN T_USER TJ ON TJ.ID = B.GSSH_TJRID LEFT JOIN T_DEPARTMENT WHDW ON WHDW.ID = B.WHRID WHERE B.REC_CZSM in (15,24) and B.ID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND (select rec_czsj from B_S_009_REC where REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) >= b.rec_czsj
) WHERE 2 >=RNO
